Compute CBASS solution path

CBASS returns a fast approximation to the Convex BiClustering solution path along with visualizations such as dendrograms and heatmaps. Visualizations may be static, interactive, or both.

CBASS(X, obs.labels = NULL, var.labels = NULL, X.center.global = TRUE,
  rho = 1, phi = 0.1, weights.obs = NULL, weights.vars = NULL,
  k.obs = NULL, k.var = NULL, t = NULL, ncores = 1, max.iter = 1e+06,
  burn.in = 50, verbose = 1, alg.type = "cbassviz", interactive = TRUE,
  static = TRUE)

Arguments

X

A n.obs by p.vars matrix with rows the observations and columns the variables
obs.labels

a vector of length n.obs containing observations (row) labels
var.labels

a vector of length p.vars containing variable (column) labels
X.center.global

a logical. If TRUE, the global mean of X is removed.
rho

A positive number for augmented lagrangian. Not advisable to change.
phi

A positive numner used for scaling in RBF kernel
weights.obs

A vector of positive number of length choose(n.obs,2). Determines observation pair fusions weight.
weights.vars

A vector of positive number of length choose(p.vars,2). Determines variable pair fusions weight.
k.obs

an integer >= 1. The number of neighbors used to create sparse observation weights
k.var

an integer >= 1. The number of neighbors used to create sparse variable weights
t

a number greater than 1. The size of the multiplicitive regularization parameter update. Typical values are: 1.1, 1.05, 1.01, 1.005. Not used CBASS-VIZ algorithms.
ncores

an integer >= 1. The number of cores to use.
max.iter

an integer. The maximum number of CARP iterations.
burn.in

an integer. The number of initial iterations at a fixed value of (small) lambda_k
verbose

either 0,1,or 2. Higher numbers indicate more verbosity while computing.
alg.type

Which CARP algorithm to perform. Choices are 'cbassviz' and 'cbass';
interactive

A logical. Should an interactive heatmap be returned?
static

A logical. Should observation and variable dendrograms be returned?

Value

X the original data matrix

cbass.cluster.path.obs the CBASS observation solution path

cbass.cluster.path.var the CBASS variable solution path

cbass.dend.obs if static==TRUE, a dendrogam representation of the observation clustering solution path

cbass.dend.var if static==TRUE, a dendrogam representation of the variable clustering solution path

phi.obs A positive numner used for scaling in observation RBF kernel

phi.var A positive numner used for scaling in variable RBF kernel

k.obs an integer >= 1. The number of neighbors used to create sparse observation weights

k.var an integer >= 1. The number of neighbors used to create sparse variable weights

burn.in an integer. The number of initial iterations at a fixed value of (small) lambda_k

alg.type Which CARP algorithm to perform. Choices are 'cbassviz' and 'cbass'

interactive A logical. Should an interactive heatmap be returned?

static A logical. Should observation and variable dendrograms be returned?

obs.labels a vector of length n.obs containing observations (row) labels

var.labels a vector of length p.vars containing variable (column) labels

X.center.global a logical. If TRUE, the global mean of X is removed.

Details

CBASS solves the following problem.
